personalInfo.description: .Net Fullstack Developer specialized in Angular, React, Python and Flutter, I am passionate about technological innovation and continuous improvement of my skills. Curious and creative, I strive to explore cutting-edge technologies to design and develop innovative solutions. Always open to new ideas and fields that captivate me, I seek to combine technical expertise and innovation spirit to take on new challenges.

experiences.mission: Development of translation and linguistic management applications

Implementation of CQRS and Clean Architecture patterns
Examples of achievements: managing XTM updates, creating an MCP for a file parser, improving user interface across the entire project lifecycle

experiences.equipe: 1 PO, 3 developers including 1 junior and 1 lead dev

projetsInternes.name: AI Image Generation
projetsInternes.description: Image generation via Stable Diffusion or ComfyUI, with a library to rate and view generated images, and an API for storing various parameters related to generation and storing information used for each image generation.

subProjects.name: Automatic Image Generation
subProjects.description: Image generation in Python using Stable Diffusion and ComfyUI. Allows generating random prompts based on checkpoints, LoRAs and other options (background, position if human, styles etc) and saving them (info via settings API).

updates.description: Use of Ollama to improve and have more randomness in prompts
Migration to ComfyUI for more flexible interface

subProjects.name: Flutter Image Manager
subProjects.description: Library made in Flutter, connecting to PostgreSQL to update and retrieve image information in addition to metadata (which can be updated).

subProjects.name: Settings and Save API
subProjects.description: Settings and save API in Python, allows storing and managing checkpoints, LoRAs, and other settings as well as generated image info (to be able to regenerate them identically if necessary).

updates.description: Added statistics for tracking image generations

subProjects.name: Settings Manager
subProjects.description: Settings manager to easily add and modify parameters, allowing centralized management of checkpoints, LoRAs and other configurations.

updates.description: Synchronization with external site to check for new checkpoint versions

projetsInternes.name: Calendarr
projetsInternes.description: Calendar application that retrieves information from Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr (connected to IMDb or other providers) to display followed series, movies, books, and music. Consists of two sub-projects: a frontend for calendar display with details and an API for communicating with Arr applications and storing configurations (addresses of Arr apps, etc.) in database.

subProjects.name: Calendar Frontend
subProjects.description: Flutter application that displays a calendar with details of followed series, movies, books, and music. Connects to the API to retrieve and display information from various Arr applications.

subProjects.name: Arr Integration API
subProjects.description: API that communicates with Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr applications to retrieve information about followed media. Stores configuration settings (Arr app addresses, API keys, etc.) in PostgreSQL database.

projetsInternes.name: Plant Management System
projetsInternes.description: Comprehensive connected plant management and monitoring system with microservices architecture. Includes mobile interface, alert management, weather integration, and document storage for plant care tracking.

subProjects.name: Frontend Applications
subProjects.description: Multi-platform Flutter application for plant monitoring and management. Available on mobile, web, and Windows. Displays plant status, watering schedules, receives push notifications, and allows users to track plant health with photos and notes.

updates.description: Implemented push notification handling and deep linking for watering reminders

subProjects.name: Backend API
subProjects.description: Core .NET 8 API managing plant data, user profiles, watering schedules, and orchestrating communication between microservices. Uses PostgreSQL for data persistence.

subProjects.name: Alert Service
subProjects.description: Dedicated service for managing alerts and notifications. Uses RabbitMQ to receive events from API service, processes alert rules, and sends push notifications via Firebase.

updates.description: Integrated push notifications for watering reminders via Firebase Cloud Messaging

subProjects.name: Meteo Service
subProjects.description: Weather data aggregation service that retrieves meteorological information from multiple providers (OpenWeatherMap, WeatherAPI, etc.) to optimize watering schedules based on local conditions.

projetsInternes.description: Custom home automation system with Arduino

recommendations.recommendation: I had the privilege of working with Rémi, who had strengthened my team for over 6 months on a complex project in 2023. His ability to turn challenges into opportunities, his solid technical knowledge and his innovative ideas were key to the success of the project. He quickly integrated himself into the team and was able to share his best practices. In this way, he left a lasting impression on our team and the project. Rémi is a very good professional with whom I enjoyed working and whom I highly recommend.

En tant que Product owner, j'ai beaucoup apprécié de travailler en équipe avec Rémi. En dehors de ses qualités de développeur, c'est une personne autonome, dynamique et fiable. Il a su être force de proposition et toujours constructif dans nos échanges. Il a également co-encadré un développeur junior pour sa montée en compétence. je travaillerais de nouveau avec lui avec plaisir si l'opportunité se représentait.
recommendations.translated: As Product owner, I really enjoyed working as a team with Rémi. Beyond his developer qualities, he is an autonomous, dynamic and reliable person. He was able to be proactive and always constructive in our exchanges. He also co-supervised a junior developer for his skill development. I would work with him again with pleasure if the opportunity arose.

recommendations.recommendation:
I, the undersigned, Clément Visseaux, project manager at Sercel, certify that Rémi Rousseau worked from May 2019 to July 2020 on an industrial project under my responsibility.
Rémi gave complete satisfaction on the objectives that were set for him.

Rémi worked on an industrial application, controlling a complex external system
He took charge of:
• The realization of user interfaces written in WPF, with the implementation of a pattern derived from MVVM
• Communication with a data server through a REST API to control this external system.
• Writing a database, with the possibility of being able to make very flexible queries on all objects in the database.
• Unit tests, continuous integration, and the implementation of code quality measurement tools like Sonar

He showed great enthusiasm and rigor in implementing reliable and robust programming techniques.
He really had the concern to improve the software, regularly making innovative proposals.
Both curious and enterprising, sharing his knowledge, he allowed us to complete on time the developments entrusted to him.
Of a very sociable character, he quickly and well integrated into the team.

Clément Visseaux
Sercel
recommendations.translated:
Je soussigné, Clément Visseaux, chef de projet chez Sercel, que Rémi Rousseau a travaillé de mai 2019 à juillet 2020 sur un projet industriel, sous ma responsabilité.
Rémi a donné entière satisfaction sur les objectifs qui lui ont été fixés.

Rémi a travaillé sur une application industrielle, pilotant un système externe complexe
Il a pris en charge :
• La réalisation des interfaces utilisateurs écrites en WPF, avec la mise en place d'un pattern dérivé du MVVM
• La communication avec un serveur de data au travers d'une API REST pour piloter ce système externe.
• L'écriture d'une base de données, avec les possibilité de pouvoir faire des requêtes très flexibles sur l'ensemble des objets en base.
• Les tests unitaires, l'intégration continue, et la mise en place d'outils de mesure de la qualité du code comme Sonar

Il a montré beaucoup d'enthousiasme et de rigueur pour mettre en place des techniques de programmation fiables et robustes.
Il a vraiment eu le souci d'améliorer le logiciel, en faisant régulièrement des propositions innovantes.
A la fois curieux et entreprenant, partageant ses connaissances, il nous a permis de mener à son terme en temps et en heure les développements qui lui ont été confiés.
D'un caractère très sociable, il s'est vite et bien intégré à l'équipe.

Clément Visseaux
Sercel
